attributes.action: bring immediate pressure on allerdale council  to reinstate road links in workington
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we, as a residents affected by the bridge out at workington,would like the prime minister to bring pressure to allerdale council,to erect a army stlye bailey bridge to affect asap road crossing back into the north side of workington,retail trade in workington is already down 80%, putting  hundreds of jobs at risk,by the prime minister bringing the army in to erect a bridge in the shortest possible time frame (7-10 days),hundreds of jobs will be safeguarded along with workingtons economic future,allerdale council is dragging its heels in bringing a soluton to the road bridges out,this attiude by our council is a negative deplorable action by so called elected by there peers councillors, it seems cockermouth is first and foremost in the councils mind,cockermouth has road acess to all sides,workington does not,we requested that we as members of the public be treated fairly and justly ,and not be ignored,like what is currently happening
